dcterms:description: Dataset used for sentence-level propaganda detection, consisting of 350 articles with a total of 16,965 sentences, including 4,720 labeled as propaganda.
dcterms:title: NLP4IF shared task on sentence-level propaganda detection

dcterms:description: Dataset used for hyperpartisan news detection, providing a basis for evaluating models in the context of biased news articles.

dcterms:description: A systematic study addressing the class imbalance problem in datasets, relevant for understanding challenges in machine learning tasks.
